ygData.subject: RE: Fed up with EQ - any ideas??
ygData.msgSnippet: Personally i dont mind the changes they are making.. i feel that they are putting new life into the game that was dying. Give examples of what issues you
ygData.messageBody:
Personally i dont mind the changes they are making.. i feel that they are
putting new life into the game that was dying.

Give examples of what issues you have.. maybe others here will discuss them.
Pros and cons like. I believe the classes are pretty much balanced, each
one needs time to develop. Most classes that seem weak in the early levels
(ie <25 ) show true strength later on.

Oh well, what does everyone else think.


To your original question, maybe you should look into Shadowbane.. ->
http://www.shadowbane.com/ another MMORP in development.

-----Original Message-----
From: kale eusi [mailto:kaleusi@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 12:05 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Fed up with EQ - any ideas??


From: "kale eusi" <kaleusi@...>

I'm rather fed up with Verant! They're constantly nerfing everything ingame
that's worth while, or ignoring classes that need to be balanced or
upgraded! So in retrospect, I'm looking to find greener pastures elsewhere.
Perhaps someone out there knows of another game (other than AC and UO) or
perhaps a group who's programming their own game similar to EQ? If so,
please don't hesistate to drop me a line or two via email. Tks in advance!

Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
